data.system_settings: iOS 9.3.5 on latest build with iPad 4th gen.
data.actual_result: the separator randomly inverts. Cannot be cleared without double tapping home button to kill the process.
data.expected_result: separator stays black as before upload.
data.short_description: The keyboard separating bar inverts after uploading files
data.steps_to_repro: - go to a text channel. - tap the attach paper clip. - select file from camera roll. - upload it.
